title: Was this deserved ?
body:
So I’m not posting this to flame Riot support or their automatic punishment system, I’m posting this to see if you, the community, think this warranted. I feel like I did not deserve a 10 game chat restriction and my honor (Level 4) to be reset to locked level 1. Here is what my in client reform card says. It is one game and one game only. 

https://gyazo.com/89df5110593b3a0d4ee87bec73782ae6

In this game I was flamed by two of my team mates, and once they began I immediately muted them. I did not argue or berate them, at one point in the game the enemy team mentioned something and I asked which of the two were flaming in all chat now after already being toxic in team chat. At this point someone on the enemy team began being toxic as well, so I muted them as well. I’m the end game screen they all posted to report me so I get “banned for being bad”. To which I responded with “REPORT ME? :’)))” but again nothing toxic. 
Can someone explain to me why I got punished, was it because they mass reported me after flaming me in game ? Riot support says I was berating and arguing in my chat logs, but I fail to see where I was.

replies.body:
Passive aggressiveness and asking for reports in the form of harassment.  

The reform card only shows you 1-5 recent games as examples of unacceptable behavior,  doesn't mean you were punished for 1 game alone. You can ask support how many recent games you were validly reported in and they'll give you a bigger picture (though still not the full picture).

For the question on whether it was deserved,  most report askers don't know that asking for reports can be considered as harassment against others, so they keep doing the same thing over many many games. At the end, the consistent mild toxicity gets them punished.

I did ask support how many games I was punished for, it was confirmed by them it was only this one. And I wasn’t asking for reports. You can clearly see I was stating I am reporting them. Not that others should report them.

> [{quoted}](name=Support Eric,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6R5yckpz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-14T16:50:57.309+0000)
>
> I did ask support how many games I was punished for, it was confirmed by them it was only this one. And I wasn’t asking for reports. You can clearly see I was stating I am reporting them. Not that others should report them.

Taunting the fact that you'll be reporting someone really isn't much better. You're essentially using it to one-up them in the argument.

Reports are not there so you can win an argument. Just report them.
I turned off Allied and Enemy chat since this happened. But is it really warranted that I get punished for one game and lost my honor level 4 ?

Out of curiosity, just how bad was your performance compared to your usual? Did you idle more than usual, not fire skills off as often (without regard to frequency of deaths), ward less, etc?

If so, it is my understanding that the bot recognises that and quietly incorporates it into the decision.
I played completely normal, just lost lane to a Yasuo as Akali. Died a few more times then usual but not going out of my way to die. I played like I normally do.
Same thing. It's the act of threatening other's account, and no one wants to be threatened.
Even so, one game, mentioning it once without any vulgarity. Is it warranted to give me a 10 game chat restriction and take away my level 4 honor ?

I find it hard to believe that this was the only game used for your punishment. 

Previously, Riot support will tell you how many recent games (to be exact, blitz crank bots tells you that, and it's the  past 20 games only)  you were validly reported. While that is still not the full picture of why you got punished, it was better than nothing. I wonder if things have changed since the 10 yr anniversary and support only tells you what is in your reform card or maybe you are incorrectly interpreting what they are saying.

If you have removed chat since your chat restriction and have played more than 20 games, I wouldn't be suprised that Riot support couldn't pull more chatlogs within your recent history. But that shouldn't be confused with how many games were considered for the punishment.

No it still tells you how many games you’ve been reported in. I played one game before contacting support regarding my punishment. This is seriously the only game I was punished for. Which is why I’m so confused.

Can I request for a screenshot?

 I wonder if their allowed frequency of toxicity has changed. Previously it was at around 20%. Maybe they dropped it to 5%.

Oh... that type of wording actually doesn't say how many games you were recently validly reported.  All that ticket did was it gave you an example of what was unacceptable. 

You need to ask them the specific question "how many games was I validly reported?".

Pretty sure it's  not just 1 game.
i always wondered why people say that they will report some1... why just not do it? xD
I did just do it, but in this case the enemy team asked if I was reporting anyone.
